ability_afterburn.Description: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. ability_afterburn's bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.
ability_afterburn.Name: Afterburn

ability_astro_rifle.Description: Equip a Rifle that deals spirit damage to hit Heroes and gives ability_astro_rifle a stacking damage bonus against them.
ability_astro_rifle.Name: Marksman

Upgrades.Description: Applies a 15% slow on hit. Lasts 1s per stack

ability_astro_shotgun_toggle.Description:
Use to toggle between your pistol and shotgun. The shotgun so powerful it forces ability_astro_shotgun_toggle to move the opposite direction of the shot while airborn. [M1] shoots forward and [M2] shoots behind you with a slight delay. The shotgun uses special bullets that does not benefit from ammo mods.

Lassoed units do not take damage when shooting backwards.
ability_astro_shotgun_toggle.Name: Force of Nature

ability_blood_bomb.Description:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
ability_blood_bomb.Name: Essence Bomb

Upgrades.Description: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26% of the original damage per second, for 6s.

ability_blood_shards.Description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
ability_blood_shards.Name: Malice

ability_bounce_pad.Description: Drop a bounce pad in the world that sends you and other heroes flying. You will stomp down on landing, dealing damage to any nearby enemies.
ability_bounce_pad.Name: Bounce Pad

Upgrades.Description: You and allies gain a +4m/s movement speed bonus for 4s on landing

ability_bullet_flurry.Description: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy.  During the flurry, ability_bullet_flurry gains a fire rate bonus and will evade some of the bullets shot at her.
ability_bullet_flurry.Name: Bullet Dance

ability_burrow.Description: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.
ability_burrow.Name: Burrow

ability_charged_shot.Description: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [UNKNOWN[ability_key]] or [M1] to hold the shot.
ability_charged_shot.Name: Charged Shot

Upgrades.Description: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay

ability_death_tax.Description: Enemies injured by Lady Geist are marked with Death Tax. Whenever a marked enemy dies, ability_death_tax gains health.
ability_death_tax.Name: Death Tax

Upgrades.Description: Reduce one of your Cooldowns by 1s when a marked enemy dies
Increase Spirit Power by 10 for 10s when a marked enemy dies.  Stacks up to 10 times.

ability_explosive_barrel.Description: Place a barrel that explodes when shot, or on landing after launched via melee attack or bounce pad. Has a minimum arm time before it can explode.
ability_explosive_barrel.Name: Powder Keg

ability_fire_bomb.Description: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.
ability_fire_bomb.Name: Concussive Combustion

Upgrades.Description: +115 Damage and 100% lifesteal from enemy heroes hit

ability_flame_dash.Description:
Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains 50% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold [M1] to dash faster.
ability_flame_dash.Name: Flame Dash

ability_gravity_lasso.Description:
Grab an enemy with your lasso and drag them along behind you. The enemy is stunned and Astro is slowed slightly during the lasso.

Lasso duration is paused for 2s during the first usage of a bounce pad.
ability_gravity_lasso.Name: Spirit Lasso

Upgrades.Description: Can lasso another enemy inside targetting area

ability_guided_arrow.Description:
After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [M1] to accelerate the owl.
Press [Space] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
ability_guided_arrow.Name: Guided Owl

Upgrades.Description: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health

ability_hat_trick.Description: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
ability_hat_trick.Name: Hat Trick

ability_health_swap.Description: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
ability_health_swap.Name: Soul Exchange

Upgrades.Description: On cast, +40% Fire Rate and +40% Spirit Resist for 8s.

ability_ice_dome.Description: ability_ice_dome freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
ability_ice_dome.Name: Frozen Shelter

Upgrades.Description: +70 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power

ability_ice_grenade.Description: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.
ability_ice_grenade.Name: Frost Grenade

Upgrades.Description: Frost Grenade now heals 145 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.

ability_icebeam.Description: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced movement speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
ability_icebeam.Name: Arctic Beam

Upgrades.Description: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within 13m of the last target hit

ability_icepath.Description:
ability_icepath creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press [Shift] / [Ctrl] to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
ability_icepath.Name: Ice Path

Upgrades.Description: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created.  Max of 55 Spirit Power

ability_immobilize_trap.Description: Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, immobilizing and then slowing them.
ability_immobilize_trap.Name: Immobilizing Trap

Upgrades.Description: ability_immobilize_trap deals +30% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by Immobilizing Trap for 10s

ability_incendiary_projectile.Description: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage ability_incendiary_projectile does to them.
ability_incendiary_projectile.Name: Catalyst

ability_intimidate.Description: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
ability_intimidate.Name: Scorn

Upgrades.Description: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets ability_intimidate deal +15% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.

ability_kali_dust_storm.Description: Send out a tornado that damages enemies it touches, as well as applying a lingering movement and fire rate slow.
ability_kali_dust_storm.Name: Dust Storm

ability_kali_trappers_bolo.Description: Throw a bolo that bounces between enemy heroes before returning to you. Victims will slow down over 2s and then become immobilized for 2.0s. Bounces once per hero.
ability_kali_trappers_bolo.Name: Trapper's Delight

Upgrades.Description: Enemies hit by the bolo give 30% Lifesteal for 8s

ability_lash_flog.Description: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.
ability_lash_flog.Name: Flog

Upgrades.Description: +105 Damage and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

ability_life_drain.Description: Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your movement speed is reduced by half. Press [2] to cancel.
ability_life_drain.Name: Life Drain

Upgrades.Description: Enemy is Silenced while being Life Drained (requires line of sight)

ability_nano_pounce.Description: Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage.  Targetting an enemy will cause slow on nearby enemies.  Targeting an ally will have reduced Cooldown and Recharge times.
ability_nano_pounce.Name: Pounce

Upgrades.Description: +30% Fire Rate Slow and +6m Slow Radius
+1 Ability Charge and reloads up to 25% of your ammo

ability_nano_proximity_ritual.Description:
Send out Ava to attack a nearby enemy. Targetted enemies have reduced healing and give health to Ava and ability_nano_proximity_ritual when damanged by them. Ava is only active when ability_nano_proximity_ritual is nearby.
While nearby Press [3] to recall Ava, Ava regains health while recalled.
ability_nano_proximity_ritual.Name: Perched Predator

Upgrades.Description: Victims receive UNKNOWN[FireRateSlow]% Fire Rate Slow and +UNKNOWN[ActiveRadius]m Active Radius
+35% Damage Amplification and -30% Heal Reduction on Victims.

ability_nano_ult_shadow.Description: Cast yourself in shadow and go Invisible.  Attacks do not break invisibility but they will temporarily reveal you.  Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
ability_nano_ult_shadow.Name: Queen of Shadows

Upgrades.Description: Heavy Melee attacks cause Silence for 3s

ability_perched_predator.Description:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press [1] to manually create the explosion.
ability_perched_predator.Name: Sekhmet's Spirit

ability_power_jump.Description: Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon. Press [Space] to cancel the glide.
ability_power_jump.Name: Rain of Arrows

Upgrades.Description: While airborne, +5 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
While airborne, +50% Bullet Lifesteal and +50% Spirit Lifesteal

ability_power_surge.Description: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
ability_power_surge.Name: Power Surge

Upgrades.Description: Shock Damage applies -15% Spirit Resist for 8s
+12 Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +3 Max Jumps

ability_scrap_blast.Description: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
ability_scrap_blast.Name: Bio Blast

ability_sleep_dagger.Description: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
ability_sleep_dagger.Name: Sleep Dagger

Upgrades.Description: Applies -12% Bullet Resist for 6s on wake-up.

ability_smoke_bomb.Description: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
ability_smoke_bomb.Name: Smoke Bomb

Upgrades.Description: After invis, gain +30% Bullet Lifesteal for 8s

ability_stacking_damage.Description: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
ability_stacking_damage.Name: Fixation

Upgrades.Description: 60 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks

ability_target_practice.Description: On activate, your next gun hit selects an enemy Hero as a target.  Shoot them 4 times to deal a burst of spirit damage.  Every Headshot will increase the burst
ability_target_practice.Name: Target Practice

Upgrades.Description: Your bullets reduce your target's Bullet Resist by -30% for 6s

ability_throw_sand.Description: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
ability_throw_sand.Name: Sand Blast

ability_ult_combo.Description: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during Combo, you permanently gain max health.
ability_ult_combo.Name: Combo

ability_warden_crowd_control.Description: Throw a flask that damages, slows, and reduces the weapon damage and stamina of enemies it hits.
ability_warden_crowd_control.Name: Alchemical Flask

Upgrades.Description: -6.5s Cooldown and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

ability_warden_high_alert.Description: Gain a spirit shield and bonus movement speed.
ability_warden_high_alert.Name: Willpower

Upgrades.Description: +200 Spirit Shield Health and now scales with Spirit Power

ability_warden_lock_down.Description: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
ability_warden_lock_down.Name: Binding Word

Upgrades.Description: ability_warden_lock_down deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s

ability_warden_riot_protocol.Description:
After charging for 2.25s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet resist.
ability_warden_riot_protocol.Name: Last Stand

ability_wrecker_salvage.Description: Stuns an enemy trooper or NPC, damaging them while held. A successful kill provides a fire rate bonus, and restores a Bio Blast charge.  This bonus stacks independently
ability_wrecker_salvage.Name: Consume

ability_wrecker_teleport.Description: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.
ability_wrecker_teleport.Name: Astral Walk

ability_wrecker_ultimate.Description: Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.
ability_wrecker_ultimate.Name: Magnetic Flux

ability_wrecking_ball.Description: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning anything it hits. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
ability_wrecking_ball.Name: Wrecking Ball

cadence_ability_anthem.Description: Burst into an inspiring song! You and any ally that comes within range get an instant reload with an extra large clip, and have a Fire Rate bonus that increases until the song ends.
cadence_ability_anthem.Name: Anthem

cadence_ability_crescendo.Description: Encase nearby enemies in glass in an increasing range over a short duration. Cadence then breaks the glass with her powerful voice, breaking any shields on the them, damaging them, and giving them massive bullet vulnerability for a duraiton after.
cadence_ability_crescendo.Name: Crescendo

cadence_ability_grandfinale.Description: Build high ground undernearth Cadence. Allies fighting from the high ground get a fire rate bonus and explosive bullets.
cadence_ability_grandfinale.Name: Grand Finale

cadence_ability_lullaby.Description: Lull your foes to sleep! Any enemy that comes in range of Cadence sleeps until woken by damage, Cadence goes out of range, or the song ends. Cadence has bonus regeneration while singing.
cadence_ability_lullaby.Name: Lullaby

cadence_ability_silencecontraptions.Description: Disarm yourself perform a long-range dash melee attack. For the duration of the song, you remain disarmed and your melee abilities apply a debuff that disarms and EMP's enemy targets.
cadence_ability_silencecontraptions.Name: Silence Contraptions

citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam.Description: Charge up your laser to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.
citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam.Name: Hyper Beam

Upgrades.Description: Hyper Beam heals citadel_ability_bebop_laser_bea for 100% of its damage on Heroes. 33% on non-hero

citadel_ability_bull_charge.Description: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along.  Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by citadel_ability_bull_charge. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
citadel_ability_bull_charge.Name: Shoulder Charge

Upgrades.Description: +5.5 Weapon Damage for 8s after colliding with an enemy

citadel_ability_bull_heal.Description: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.
citadel_ability_bull_heal.Name: Siphon Life

citadel_ability_bull_leap.Description:
Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press [M1] to crash down early.
citadel_ability_bull_leap.Name: Seismic Impact

Upgrades.Description: Gain 100 Max HP and 15% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts 25s.
On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires 3s after landing.

citadel_ability_card_toss.Description: Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
citadel_ability_card_toss.Name: Card Trick

Upgrades.Description: Chain lightning can hit any enemies around the target.

citadel_ability_charged_tackle.Description: Build up power then enter a charge, dragging and damaging enemies in your path. Can be canceled early.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle.Name: Charged Tackle

Upgrades.Description: Gain a 400HP Spirit Shield for 20s when Charged Tackle ends.
Remove Prepare Time and -9.5s Ability Cooldown

citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine.Description:
Start charging your weapon and gain increased movement speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing [M2] while an empowered shot is available.
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine.Name: Kinetic Carbine

citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade.Description: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade against the victim.
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade.Name: Pulse Grenade

citadel_ability_chrono_swap.Description: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
citadel_ability_chrono_swap.Name: Paradoxical Swap

citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall.Description: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it.  Enemies that touch the wall will take damage as a percentage of their max health and be briefly slowed.
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall.Name: Time Wall

Upgrades.Description: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 3.0s

citadel_ability_fissure_wall.Description:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press [M1] or [3] to erupt the wall early.
citadel_ability_fissure_wall.Name: Spectral Wall

Upgrades.Description: Removes 1 stamina and amplifies citadel_ability_fissure_wall's damage by 25% on hit enemies for 7s
Adds a 1s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall

citadel_ability_flying_strike.Description: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
citadel_ability_flying_strike.Name: Flying Strike

Upgrades.Description: +6 Weapon Damage for 10s after striking the target

citadel_ability_healing_slash.Description: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
citadel_ability_healing_slash.Name: Crimson Slash

Upgrades.Description: +10% of Max Health Heal on hero hit

citadel_ability_hook.Description: Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.
citadel_ability_hook.Name: Hook

Upgrades.Description: Bebop deals 30% more bullet damage against hooked enemies for 10s

citadel_ability_hornet_chain.Description: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
citadel_ability_hornet_chain.Name: Stake

citadel_ability_hornet_leap.Description: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
citadel_ability_hornet_leap.Name: Flight

citadel_ability_hornet_mark.Description: Vindicta mark's an enemy. They are visible on the minimap for the duration, and Vindicta can detect them through walls.
citadel_ability_hornet_mark.Name: Vindicta's Mark

Upgrades.Description: When a marked enemy is killed, Vindicta immediately gains 1 Charge for Assassinate

citadel_ability_hornet_snipe.Description: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.
citadel_ability_hornet_snipe.Name: Assassinate

citadel_ability_hornet_sting.Description: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
citadel_ability_hornet_sting.Name: Crow Familiar

Upgrades.Description: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within 15m

citadel_ability_infinity_slash.Description: Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation, your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster, your weapon has infinite ammo, and you gain damage resists and immunity to negative status effects. You are unable to die in this mode.
citadel_ability_infinity_slash.Name: Shadow Transformation

citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge.Description: Provides a large speed bonus to you and nearby allies. The speed bonus decays over time.
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge.Name: Pack Hunter

Upgrades.Description: 30% Damage Lifesteal for the duration of Pack Hunter

citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade.Description: Throw a spinning blade that deals damage and returns to you.
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade.Name: Occilioblade

Upgrades.Description: +40 Damage and Occilioblade gains +100% more damage from spirit
-7s Cooldown for each enemy hit by Occilioblade

citadel_ability_lash.Description: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
citadel_ability_lash.Name: Grapple

Upgrades.Description: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
+20% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff

citadel_ability_lash_down_strike.Description: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike.Name: Ground Strike

Upgrades.Description: Struck enemies are popped into the air and slowed by 50% for 3s
Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling

citadel_ability_lash_ultimate.Description:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press [M1] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
citadel_ability_lash_ultimate.Name: Death Slam

citadel_ability_lightning_ball.Description: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
citadel_ability_lightning_ball.Name: Lightning Ball

citadel_ability_mobile_resupply.Description: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.
citadel_ability_mobile_resupply.Name: Medicinal Specter

Upgrades.Description: +35% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter

citadel_ability_nikuman.Description: While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby. Dashing does not break channel.
citadel_ability_nikuman.Name: Rejuvenating Aurora

Upgrades.Description: Gain +4m/s movespeed bonus for 8s if Aurora is fully channeled.  Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
Full move and ability use and additionaly heals +3.8% of Max Health per second

citadel_ability_passive_beefy.Description: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.
citadel_ability_passive_beefy.Name: Infernal Resilience

citadel_ability_power_slash.Description:
Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press [1] or [M1] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
citadel_ability_power_slash.Name: Power Slash

Upgrades.Description: Provides a 300 bullet shield for 8s on teleport. Shield amount scales with Spirit Power.

citadel_ability_psychic_daggers.Description: Telekinetically throw cards that hit random targets around you.
citadel_ability_psychic_daggers.Name: Royal Flush

Upgrades.Description: Each card bounces once onto another enemy in range

citadel_ability_psychic_lift.Description: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them for a short time. When the lift ends, the target receives Telekinesis damage.
citadel_ability_psychic_lift.Name: Telekinesis

Upgrades.Description: Telekinesis will target enemies in an area around citadel_ability_psychic_lift

citadel_ability_psychic_pulse.Description: Sense enemies in front of you, revealing their position through walls to your team.  Card Trick can target enemies seen through walls
citadel_ability_psychic_pulse.Name: Psychic Pulse

citadel_ability_rocket_barrage.Description: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.
citadel_ability_rocket_barrage.Name: Heavy Barrage

citadel_ability_running_decoy.Description: citadel_ability_running_decoy creates a temporary decoy that will run towards the target location and shoot at any nearby enemies.
citadel_ability_running_decoy.Name: Decoy

Upgrades.Description: Move speed +2 m/s while decoy is active
Astro is healed 100% of the damage taken by the decoy

citadel_ability_self_vacuum.Description: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them. Once it's finished, enemies get knocked into the air.
citadel_ability_self_vacuum.Name: Singularity

Upgrades.Description: Singularity takes 3.8% of the enemies' max health each second.

citadel_ability_shieldedsentry.Description:
Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime.
Turrets gain 30% of citadel_ability_shieldedsentry's max health and have 60% Spirit Resist. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.
citadel_ability_shieldedsentry.Name: Mini Turret

Upgrades.Description: +1 Ability Charge and turrets apply +25% Movement Slow
+10m Attack Range and +10% turret fire rate

citadel_ability_shiv_dagger.Description: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy.  Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
citadel_ability_shiv_dagger.Name: Serrated Knives

citadel_ability_shiv_dash.Description:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
citadel_ability_shiv_dash.Name: Slice and Dice

Upgrades.Description: Reduce cooldown by 2s per enemy hero hit (1s for Non-Hero). Max -6s per Dash.

citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage.Description: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time.  Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage.Name: Bloodletting

Upgrades.Description: Gain +2 m/s move speed while at full rage.
+8% Enemy Health Threshold and +5% Full Rage Bonus Damage
Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.

citadel_ability_static_charge.Description: Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
citadel_ability_static_charge.Name: Static Charge

citadel_ability_sticky_bomb.Description:
Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.
Gain +2.5% bomb damage for every enemy hero hit.
Hold [M3] to cast a Sticky Bomb on yourself.
citadel_ability_sticky_bomb.Name: Sticky Bomb

Upgrades.Description: On Attach, disarms the target for 3.5s

citadel_ability_stomp.Description: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.
citadel_ability_stomp.Name: Kinetic Pulse

Upgrades.Description: Hit enemies are fire rate and movement slowed by 35% for 4s.
citadel_ability_stomp deals 30% more Weapon Damage to hit enemies for 8s

citadel_ability_storm_cloud.Description: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
citadel_ability_storm_cloud.Name: Storm Cloud

Upgrades.Description: +35% Bullet Resist while channeling Storm Cloud

citadel_ability_tangotether.Description: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them.  Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [2] to Lock on to a target
citadel_ability_tangotether.Name: Watcher's Covenant

citadel_ability_tengu_airlift.Description:
Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. citadel_ability_tengu_airlift and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals -50% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
[M1] to accelerate flying speed.
[M2] to drop ally/bomb.
citadel_ability_tengu_airlift.Name: Air Drop

Upgrades.Description: -20% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for 12s
Applies Silence on enemies hit for +4.5s

citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form.Description: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.
citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form.Name: Stone Form

citadel_ability_tengu_urn.Description: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.
citadel_ability_tengu_urn.Name: Kudzu Bomb

citadel_ability_uppercut.Description: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage where they land. Does not damage allies.
citadel_ability_uppercut.Name: Exploding Uppercut

Upgrades.Description: On Uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin-up time, 2x range, and +60% weapon damage for 12s
On Uppercut enemy Hero, set Hook cooldown to 0 and instantly +100% bullets to your current clip

citadel_ability_void_sphere.Description: citadel_ability_void_sphere briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max 8s). Can be cast with [M3] to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
citadel_ability_void_sphere.Name: Quantum Entanglement

citadel_ability_wing_blast.Description: Create a blast of air that pushes enemies away and damages them.
citadel_ability_wing_blast.Name: Wing Blast

citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire.Description: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire.Name: Full Auto

gunslinger_rapid_fire.Description: Rapidly fire your guns at a target with perfect accuracy and 50% increased damage for 1.5s.  Causes gunslinger_rapid_fire and the target to float if in the air.
gunslinger_rapid_fire.Name: Rapid Fire

gunslinger_rocket_launcher.Description: Equip a rocket launcher that fires explosive rockets.  Rocket blasts can launch enemies and gunslinger_rocket_launcher into the air.
gunslinger_rocket_launcher.Name: Rocket Launcher

gunslinger_sleep_bomb.Description: Throw out a sleep bomb that explodes on impact, creating an expanding cloud that sleeps enemies it touches.
gunslinger_sleep_bomb.Name: Sleep Bomb

gunslinger_tenacity.Description: Gain 15% bullet life steal, increased by up to 100% based on gunslinger_tenacity's missing health.
gunslinger_tenacity.Name: Tenacity

mirage_djinn_bomb.Description: Launch a slow projectile that you can activate anywhere along its path to detonate it, dealing damage to enemies caught in its radius. Deals bonus damage for each additional hero hit.
mirage_djinn_bomb.Name: Djinn Bomb

mirage_djinns_reach.Description: Target an enemy hero, tethering it to up to two other enemy heroes nearby. Tethered heroes have their movement constrained to each other, have reduced bullet resistance, and suffer a portion of the damage any of the other tethered heroes receive. The primary target receives a heavy slow that it recovers from over a short time.
mirage_djinns_reach.Name: Djinn's Chains

mirage_fire_beetles.Description: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, applying a lifesteal over time to enemies they hit. Once the launch window ends, this ability goes on cooldown.
mirage_fire_beetles.Name: Fire Scarabs

mirage_sand_phantom.Description: You become enveloped in a whirlwind that provides bullet evasion and movement speed.
mirage_sand_phantom.Name: Tempest Ward

mirage_tornado.Description: Send out a tornado that damages enemies and lifts them up in the air. While they're up in the air, targets will fully evade all bullets.
mirage_tornado.Name: Tornado

rutger_cheat_death.Description: When taking otherwise fatal damage, Rutger becomes unkillable for 4s.
rutger_cheat_death.Name: Cheat Death

Upgrades.Description: +50% Bonus Movement speed when Cheat Death activates.
+100% Bullet Lifesteal when Cheat Death activates.

rutger_force_field.Description: Create a field at target location that pushes enemies away from its outer edge.
rutger_force_field.Name: Force Field

rutger_pulse.Description:
Release a fast pulse in a large area that damages, slows, and prevents enemies from using abilities.
The damage dealt is based on how close the enemy is to the center of the pulse.
rutger_pulse.Name: Pulse

rutger_rocket.Description:
Launch a rocket that deals damage in an area and applies knockback.
Rutger receives 50% damage and 175% knockback from his own rocket if he's in its impact radius.
rutger_rocket.Name: Rocket Launcher

slork_ability_invis.Description: Fade from view when not shooting or using abilities. When fully invisible, can be cast to deal 80 damage and +2 stamina damage to enemies in front of Slork.
slork_ability_invis.Name: Ambush Predator

slork_chomp.Description: Dash forward and grab onto an enemy, biting them repeatedly. The enemy is slowed, disarmed, and silenced while grappled. When the target is below half health, deal an additional 4% of their max health in damage.
slork_chomp.Name: Chomp

Upgrades.Description: Chomp deals 6% of the enemies missing health each second.

slork_last_breath.Description: Encase yourself in a sphere of water that can absorb up to 120 damage before bursting. When the sphere disipates for any reason enemies in range take 80 damage.
slork_last_breath.Name: Deep's Embrace

slork_raging_current.Description: Call water from deep underground, saturating an area. Every 0.5s a torrent will well up, tossing enemies into the air after a 0.75s delay. Enemies will be stunned and their bullet armor reduced.
slork_raging_current.Name: Torrent Storm

slork_riptide.Description: Summon a churning vortex of superheated water that burns enemies and lauches them towards Slork.
slork_riptide.Name: Riptide

slork_scald.Description: Spray out an arc of superheated water that damages enemies over time.
slork_scald.Name: Scald

synth_affliction.Description:
Apply damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
synth_affliction.Name: Affliction

synth_barrage.Description:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
synth_barrage.Name: Barrage

synth_blitz.Description: Gain fast firing rate and bullet lifesteal for a brief flurry of shots.
synth_blitz.Name: Blitz

Upgrades.Description: Each Blitz shot amplifies your spirit damage against the target by 7% for 15s
+4 Fast Fire Shots and +4 Max Stacks

synth_grasp.Description: Tether all nearby enemy heroes to you and gain Bullet Shield for each enemy hero tethered. You're immobilized for the duration.
synth_grasp.Name: Grasp

Upgrades.Description: Damages and lifesteals 4% of targets' max health per second

synth_plasma_flux.Description: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [2] to teleport to its location.
synth_plasma_flux.Name: Flying Cloak

Upgrades.Description: +7 Weapon Damage for 10s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.

synth_pulse.Description: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
synth_pulse.Name: Enchanter's Satchel

thumper_ability_1.Description: Thumper focuses a high power acoustic wave to reflect off of a hard surface. Blasting shards of material off in the reflected wave.
thumper_ability_1.Name: Shatter Cannon

thumper_ability_2.Description: Rolls out a spike strip that damage enemies more the further they move through it.
thumper_ability_2.Name: Spike Strip

thumper_ability_3.Description: Sends out a badger drone to harry an enemy and reveal it's position.
thumper_ability_3.Name: Badger Drone

thumper_ability_4.Description: Blow enemies away with a high powered blast of air.
thumper_ability_4.Name: Vortex

tokamak_breach.Description: Explosively decompress a cloud of coolant. Allies inside the cloud are invisible.
tokamak_breach.Name: Breach

Upgrades.Description: +UNKNOWN[SlowPercent]% Movement Slow and -UNKNOWN[BulletArmorReduction] Bullet Resist to enemies in smoke.
Purge Debuffs on Tokamak when cast.
Effects linger for UNKNOWN[LingerAfterLeavingSmokeDurationPerHeat]s after leaving smoke.

tokamak_crimson_cannon.Description: Collect targets until ready to unload. Each shot is 0.6s apart.
tokamak_crimson_cannon.Name: Pulse Cannon

tokamak_dying_star.Description: Launch forward damaging all enemies near where you land, knocking them into the air.
tokamak_dying_star.Name: Dying Star

tokamak_heat_sinks.Description: Tokamak harnesses more power as they heat up. Tokamak's melee strikes add a 0.5s burn dealing 80 Heat Power DPS.
tokamak_heat_sinks.Name: Thermal Vault

Upgrades.Description: +20.0 Base Heat Power, +40.0 Max Heat Power

tokamak_hot_shot.Description: Blast your enemies with a jet of superheated plasma. Deals additional damage when the heat guage is in the red. Triples heat dissipation while active.
tokamak_hot_shot.Name: Hot Shot

Upgrades.Description:
+16 Normal DPS and +16 Normal DPS Scale
+48 Hot DPS and +48 Hot DPS Scale

tokamak_radiance.Description: Bring your core to the brink of criticality, blinding and damaging any that look in your direction. Damage increases when enemies look directly at you.
tokamak_radiance.Name: Blinding Radiance

viscous_goo_bowling_ball.Description: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
viscous_goo_bowling_ball.Name: Goo Ball

Upgrades.Description: Can cast abilities and use items while rolling

viscous_goo_grenade.Description: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
viscous_goo_grenade.Name: Splatter

viscous_goo_puddle.Description: Turn yourself into a puddle of goo, becoming immune to harm and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
viscous_goo_puddle.Name: Goo Form

viscous_restorative_goo.Description: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that purges debuffs, protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [Space] to escape early.
viscous_restorative_goo.Name: The Cube

Upgrades.Description: Increases Movement Speed and Stamina Recovery

viscous_telepunch.Description: Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.
viscous_telepunch.Name: Puddle Punch

yakuza_kobun.Description: Summons a subordinate gangster to follow a friendly unit and attack enemies closest to that target.  Double tap to self cast.
yakuza_kobun.Name: Hired Muscle

Upgrades.Description: +20% of The Boss' health to Gangster Health

yakuza_protection_racket.Description: Create a protective force shield to protect an ally and increase their crit damage. Purges negative effects on the target when cast.
yakuza_protection_racket.Name: Protection Racket

Upgrades.Description: -60% Weapon Recoil, -60% move speed reduction when shooting.

yakuza_setting_sun.Description: Call down a precision Gamma Ray blast from orbit, hitting all units in the radius at every height regardless of cover. Units near the center of the beam take more damage.
yakuza_setting_sun.Name: Setting Sun

yakuza_shakedown_target.Description: Send a drone to lock an area down, rooting and damaging enemies in the area. The link between your drones shares a portion of the damage you take with a random rooted enemy.
yakuza_shakedown_target.Name: Shakedown
